product.name: Nike Air Max 90s
product.description: Known as the Air Max III until 2000, when it was reissued taking its name from the year of its launch.

product.name: Nike Air Force 1s Low/Mid/High-top
product.description: The shoe you must have in your collection.

product.name: Adidas Yeezy 700
product.description: If you like Kayne west you will buy this

product.name: Jordan 1 Chicago
product.description: Undoubtedly the most popular and best Jordans of all time.

product.name: Jordan 3 Black Cement
product.description: It was the first time the original ‘Nike Air” branding was featured on the Black Cement since its 2001 incarnation.

product.name: Jordan 5 Fire Red
product.description: The 5 Fire Red Retro OG is one of the newest pieces in the Air Jordan portfolio.

product.name: Jordan 4 ‘Bred’ Black Cement
product.description: They say a classic never dies, and the Air Jordan 4 is one example of true longevity.

product.name: Jordan 11 Concord
product.description: Michael Jordan stepped onto the court and into sneaker history with this now iconic pair of Air Jordan XIs.

product.name: Jordan 6 Black Infrared
product.description: INFRARED is pretty much the ultimate Air Jordan sneaker.
